sources.name: HUBST1
sources.script:
source(output(
		LH_HUB_STATUS_KEY as decimal(10,0),
		SR_NO as string,
		LH_PATID as decimal(10,0),
		HUB_PAT_ID as decimal(10,0),
		SUB_TYP as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: false,
	validateSchema: false) ~> HUBST1

sinks.name: stgmnkhubrefstts1
sinks.script:
EXPTRANS sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false) ~> stgmnkhubrefstts1
